verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: Command the children of Israel, that they bring unto thee pure oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamps to burn continually.
verses.verse_html:
2Command the children of Israel, that they bring unto thee pure oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamps to burn continually. ▼
▼ to cause: Heb. to cause to ascend

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to cause: Heb. to cause to ascend
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to cause: Heb. to cause to ascend

verses.text_plain: Without the vail of the testimony, in the tabernacle of the congregation, shall Aaron order it from the evening unto the morning before the Lord continually: it shall be a statute for ever in your generations.
verses.verse_html: 3Without the vail of the testimony, in the tabernacle of the congregation, shall Aaron order it from the evening unto the morning before the Lord continually: it shall be a statute for ever in your generations.

verses.text_plain: He shall order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before the Lord continually.
verses.verse_html: 4He shall order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before the Lord continually.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt take fine flour, and bake twelve cakes thereof: two tenth deals shall be in one cake.
verses.verse_html: 5And thou shalt take fine flour, and bake twelve cakes thereof: two tenth deals shall be in one cake.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt set them in two rows, six on a row, upon the pure table before the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 6And thou shalt set them in two rows, six on a row, upon the pure table before the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt put pure frankincense upon each row, that it may be on the bread for a memorial, even an offering made by fire unto the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 7And thou shalt put pure frankincense upon each row, that it may be on the bread for a memorial, even an offering made by fire unto the Lord.

tokens.text: that it may be on the bread

verses.text_plain: Every sabbath he shall set it in order before the Lord continually, being taken from the children of Israel by an everlasting covenant.
verses.verse_html: 8Every sabbath he shall set it in order before the Lord continually, being taken from the children of Israel by an everlasting covenant.

verses.text_plain: And it shall be Aaron’s and his sons’; and they shall eat it in the holy place: for it is most holy unto him of the offerings of the Lord made by fire by a perpetual statute.
verses.verse_html: 9And it shall be Aaron’s and his sons’; and they shall eat it in the holy place: for it is most holy unto him of the offerings of the Lord made by fire by a perpetual statute.

verses.text_plain: And the son of an Israelitish woman, whose father was an Egyptian, went out among the children of Israel: and this son of the Israelitish woman and a man of Israel strove together in the camp;
verses.verse_html: 10And the son of an Israelitish woman, whose father was an Egyptian, went out among the children of Israel: and this son of the Israelitish woman and a man of Israel strove together in the camp;

verses.text_plain: And the Israelitish woman’s son blasphemed the name of the Lord, and cursed. And they brought him unto Moses: (and his mother’s name was Shelomith, the daughter of Dibri, of the tribe of Dan:)
verses.verse_html: 11And the Israelitish woman’s son blasphemed the name of the Lord, and cursed. And they brought him unto Moses: (and his mother’s name was Shelomith, the daughter of Dibri, of the tribe of Dan:)

verses.text_plain: And they put him in ward, that the mind of the Lord might be shewed them.
verses.verse_html:
12And they put him in ward, that the mind of the Lord might be shewed them. ▼
▼ that…: Heb. to expound unto them according to the mouth of the Lord

footnotes.body_text: ▼ that…: Heb. to expound unto them according to the mouth of the Lord
footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: Heb. to expound unto them according to the mouth of the Lord

verses.text_plain: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.verse_html: 13And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.text_plain: Bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp; and let all that heard him lay their hands upon his head, and let all the congregation stone him.
verses.verse_html: 14Bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp; and let all that heard him lay their hands upon his head, and let all the congregation stone him.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, Whosoever curseth his God shall bear his sin.
verses.verse_html: 15And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, Whosoever curseth his God shall bear his sin.

verses.text_plain: And he that blasphemeth the name of the Lord, he shall surely be put to death, and all the congregation shall certainly stone him: as well the stranger, as he that is born in the land, when he blasphemeth the name of the Lord, shall be put to death.
verses.verse_html: 16And he that blasphemeth the name of the Lord, he shall surely be put to death, and all the congregation shall certainly stone him: as well the stranger, as he that is born in the land, when he blasphemeth the name of the Lord, shall be put to death.

tokens.text: as he that is born in the land

verses.text_plain: And he that killeth any man shall surely be put to death.
verses.verse_html:
17And he that killeth any man shall surely be put to death. ▼
▼ killeth…: Heb. smiteth the life of a man

footnotes.body_text: ▼ killeth…: Heb. smiteth the life of a man
footnotes.body_html: ▼ killeth…: Heb. smiteth the life of a man

verses.text_plain: And he that killeth a beast shall make it good; beast for beast.
verses.verse_html:
18And he that killeth a beast shall make it good; beast for beast. ▼
▼ beast for…: Heb. life for life

footnotes.body_text: ▼ beast for…: Heb. life for life
footnotes.body_html: ▼ beast for…: Heb. life for life

verses.text_plain: And if a man cause a blemish in his neighbour; as he hath done, so shall it be done to him;
verses.verse_html: 19And if a man cause a blemish in his neighbour; as he hath done, so shall it be done to him;

verses.text_plain: Breach for breach, eye for eye, tooth for tooth: as he hath caused a blemish in a man, so shall it be done to him again.
verses.verse_html: 20Breach for breach, eye for eye, tooth for tooth: as he hath caused a blemish in a man, so shall it be done to him again.

verses.text_plain: And he that killeth a beast, he shall restore it: and he that killeth a man, he shall be put to death.
verses.verse_html: 21And he that killeth a beast, he shall restore it: and he that killeth a man, he shall be put to death.

tokens.text: he shall be put to death

verses.text_plain: Ye shall have one manner of law, as well for the stranger, as for one of your own country: for I am the Lord your God.
verses.verse_html: 22Ye shall have one manner of law, as well for the stranger, as for one of your own country: for I am the Lord your God.

tokens.text: as for one of your own country

verses.text_plain: And Moses spake to the children of Israel, that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp, and stone him with stones. And the children of Israel did as the Lord commanded Moses.
verses.verse_html: 23And Moses spake to the children of Israel, that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp, and stone him with stones. And the children of Israel did as the Lord commanded Moses.
